sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-resume', templateUrl: './resume.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resume.component.scss'] }) export class ResumeComponent { }

PROFILE AND CAREER OBJECTIVES

I am a hardworking and motivated person who enjoys working with people. I am honest and committed to tasks assigned to me and always strive to do my best. Punctuality is very important to me. I love learning new skills and sharing my knowledge.

My top priority is to learn new skills and gain as much experience as possible. I am eager to broaden my knowledge and make a positive difference wherever I work.

EDUCATION

Union High School (Graaff-Reinet)

My achievements were:

  • School Prefect (2020)
  • Top 8 Provincial Gala (2014 -2019)
  • Provintial Biatholon (2017)
  • Provintial ShotPut
  • School Full Colors for Swimming (2019, 2020)
  • School Half Colors for Rugby (2019)
  • Senior Victor Ludorum Trophy (2019)
  • Spar River Mile – Completed in 17min (2020)

CTU Training Solutions (Stellenbosch)

QCTO FET Certificate: Systems Development (Foundation) (2021)

Modules Completed:

  • Basic Programming
  • Computer Architecture
  • Cloud Fundamentals
  • Core Web Development
  • Cybernetics
  • Digital Literacy and Proficiency
  • Network Architecture
  • Programmer Ethics
  • Robotic Development
  • Principles of Program Design

IT Systems Development: Software Development (2022)

Completed:

  • Beginner Java
  • Programming with C#
  • Solutions Development

IT Systems Development: Games Development (2022)

Modules Completed:

  • Game Digital Art and Animation
  • Game Design Platform
  • Game Design Theory and Story Telling

INTERNSHIP

I worked as an intern for an independent contractor who made use of the Metaverse Systems
(lourenslinde@gmail.com)
(04 July 2022 – 15 July 2022)
